docs.lead_paragraph: On a typically busy Friday recently, 9,451 passengers passed through the customs gates at Kennedy International Airport, where a stepped-up baggage inspection system designed to stem the flow of narcotics has been in effect since early June.

headline.main: Little Smuggling Found In Kennedy Drug Drive; Little Smuggling Is Found in Kennedy Drug Drive

docs.abstract: US Customs Comr Ambrose tells Cong com that stepped-up baggage inspection system at Kennedy Internatl Airport designed to stem flow of narcotics has not made any significant gains in curbing heroin smuggling in 1st 24 days of operation; campaign described; illus
docs.snippet: On a typically busy Friday recently, 9,451 passengers passed through the customs gates at Kennedy International Airport, where a stepped-up baggage inspection system designed to stem the flow of narcotics has been in effect since early June.
